BC¶

Mass Flow Rate BC¶

src.PINNBox.BC.MassFlowBC.MassFlowBC(points, values, component=0, dy=[])[source]¶

Dirichlet boundary condition for a set of points. Compare the output (that associates with points) with values (target data).

Parameters:

  • points – An array of points where the corresponding target values are known and used for training.

  • values – An array of values that gives the exact solution of the problem.

  • component – The output component satisfying this BC.
